MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-JAN-2021 22:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.40pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at Little Kerse Farm and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:24PM on Thursday 14 January 2021.
